TextLibrary.Text: Alright, we have obtained all we need for the attunement.
Alright, thanks to you, we have obtained all we need for the attunement.
Can we perform the attunement here?
I didn't like that last part. Hopefully it will have been worth it. Where do we go from here?
We must head to the "Holy Source" to perform the attunement.
We will be able to do much good once I am attuned with the device. We must head to the "Holy Source" to perform the attunement.
Set a course for Quesada Prime, home to many ancient and mystical temples.
Set a course for Quesada Prime, home to many ancient and mystical temples.
Alright, just remember that I'm in charge here.
